viewData.name: LG LJ5000 43" Class Full HD LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy LG LJ5000 43" Class Full HD LED TV featuring Full HD 1920 x 1080 LED Panel, 60 Hz Refresh Rate for Smooth Motion 2 x HDMI / 1 x USB. Review LG LJ5000
viewData.long_description: Enjoy high-definition content with the LG LJ5000- 43" Class Full HD LED TV. This 42.5" LED-backlit LCD panel features a native resolution of 1920 x 1080, allowing you to view detailed 1080p Full HD images, and the 60 Hz refresh rate helps reduce the blur commonly associated with fast-moving on-screen objects. Its two HDMI inputs will allow you to connect your digital HD sources, such as HD cable/satellite boxes or game consoles.
